content.rendered:
Services

What to Expect

Each session will last 60 minutes. It is recommended that a client questionnaire and consult form be filled out prior to your session. (See below)

Your first session can include a tongue and pulse evaluation based on Ayurveda.

During your healing session (fully clothed) you may experience insights, see colors, feel tingling or warmth and have a deep feeling of peace and calm.

Following your session, you will be provided with recommendations such as essential oils, herbs, meditation, diet, and gemstones.                

[/vc_column_text][mk_divider divider_width=”one_half”][mk_padding_divider][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Office Visit

 Marma therapy-One Hour- $175

Marmas are the junction or entry points between body, mind, and emotions. Gently pressing these points along the front and back of the body increases vital energy flow for restoration and rejuvenation, awakening your inner healing system. Marma is anti-aging and also rejuvenates the skin.

Essential oils, gemstones, and sound are part of this unique mind/body therapy.

Package of Three Sessions- $475 (Valid for three months from the first session)

Remote sessions are also available by phone.

Schedule a free 20 minute /question/strategy session

678-357-3443

 

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Whole Health Home Visit for Women- balancing your inner and outer home.

First Hour- $185

No traffic, no stress, I come right to your own home!

We will begin by tuning and balancing your inner being with “Marma Therapy”. Marma points are the junction between mind/body and emotions. When gently pressed along the front and back of the body this gentle pressure will restore and rejuvenate your entire being. Marma is like going on a vacation except the results are lasting.

Essential oils, sound, and gemstones are used to harmonize the vibrational frequencies of your body/mind. You will feel a renewed glow.

 

 Second Hour (optional)- $100

Your outer home needs to reflect the harmony and balance you need to maintain your new vibe.

You may want to know, “Where is the ideal spot in my home for a sacred space?”

” What are some easy yoga postures I can do at home”? ” What colors will uplift or calm me and my family?” ” What essential oils should I use at home”?

You will have all the answers and inspiration you need to balance your inner and outer home!

 

Cash or checks are accepted. Credit Cards accepted with 4% processing fee added.

[/vc_column_text][mk_divider divider_width=”one_half”][/vc_column][/vc_row][mk_page_section][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Prior to your visit, please complete these forms and bring with you to your first appointment.
